title: 如何利用ChestCommands菜单插件弄随身工作台之类的东西
author: kengshenxt
txt_content:
如题：如何利用ChestCommands菜单插件弄随身工作台/随身末影箱
谢谢

replies.author: AD【钙奶】
replies.txt_content:
AD_gainai#取什么都可以，只有不重复:
  NAME: '随身工作台'
  ID: 1#显示的物品
  KEEP-OPEN: true#点击是否关闭菜单
  COMMAND: 'workbench'
  POSITION-X: 1#位置|列
  POSITION-Y: 1#位置|行


AD_gainai111#取什么都可以，只有不重复:
  NAME: '&e随身末影箱·'
  ID: 2#显示的物品
  KEEP-OPEN: true#点击是否关闭菜单
  COMMAND: 'ec'
  POSITION-X: 3#位置|列
  POSITION-Y: 1#位置|行

replies.author: Didiao0v0
replies.txt_content:
1:
  NAME: '&e随身工作台'
  ID: 58
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  COMMAND: 'workbench'
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


2:
  NAME: '&e随身末影箱·'
  ID: 130
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  COMMAND: 'ec'
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2

replies.author: UNLH
replies.txt_content: 你要先授权权限玩家才可以使用

replies.author: liu00
replies.txt_content:
给予玩家一下权限
    - essentials.enderchest
    - essentials.workbench复制代码
